column5: The Canadian Fishing Tour will be having 3 walleye tournaments in SW Ontario starting April 2006. April 23 Detroit River(river only) May 21 Lake St. Clair (inlcuding Detroit River and St. Clair River) June 11 Lake Erie(Leamington Ont) These are great locations with excellent dates chosen. Cost $150Cdn/team per event no membership fees for 2006. The Canadian Fishing Tour is a premiere circuit that uses the Shimano Live release system for it's weigh in. http://www.canadianfishingtour.com
